title: Gullah/Geechee Cultural Heritage Corridor: Plan Your Visit
body: Plan Your Visit          As part of a living, breathing, changing landscape, the Gullah/Geechee Cultural Heritage Corridor is not subject to the same restrictions as traditional National Park sites. Rather, it reflects the still evolving history and culture of the people who call the region home. So be patient! Be observant! And, be prepared to meet residents who are proud of the special place in which they live. Visit http://gullahgeecheecorridor.org/ for more information.
